node.display_long_description:
Drive, Shoot & Drift like NEVER before.

Key features:
Virtual Steering, Gamepad & Steering wheel supported
Cross Buy for Rift & Quest
Enhanced Graphics for Quest 2
Over 13 unique tracks and growing
Race up to 8 friends
Offline Story mode
Over 100 hours of Gameplay, Quests & Achievements
Cross-platform play
Cloud save
Regular online tournaments

Extras:
Motion sickness prevention options
Onboarding class for new VR racer
Game for everyone with Casual & Hardcore racing modes
Social with meme, stickers, voice chat & dance moves
Customize every detail from your outfit down to the rim of your car

Coming soon:
More Weapons
More online Tournaments

Dash Dash World is a cross-platform VR kart racing game equipped with immersive full-hand driving and weapon controls. Lose yourself in hundreds of hours of gameplay. Including a fascinating story mode, exhilarating online tournaments, more than a trillion customization combinations, and hundreds of achievements for the trophy hunters out there!

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Hotfix 3.1.1
- Fix game crash when entering the game without setting any permissions.

nodes.title: This Virtual Steering control is insane! Take VR racing to new height, only at Dash Dash World
nodes.body_text:
We just revamped the Virtual Steering and it is better than ever.

You can now freely steer, grab items, accelerate, brake, or boost virtually and separately!

Virtual steering is also improved become much easier to control and less prone to fast movement.



View Update trailer on Youtube here. And as always, there is a Redeem code hidden in our video ;)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L-sflzgA2BQ

Download the free update today to enjoy an all-new experience along with the big 3.0 UPDATE last week including:



🗺 2 New tracks
👪 8 Player Matchmaking
🔫 New weapon
🏆 New singleplayer campaigns
🚘 New Virtual Steering



Coming soon features

🔗 Full offline mode
🎮 More game mode difficulty



Let's connect👇
🙌 Discord 
💁🏻‍♀️ FB Group
🤖 Reddit

💁🏻‍♂️ Facebook
🐦 Twitter
📸 Instagram
📽️ Youtube

See you on the race track 🚗 DashDashRacing.com

node.reviewDescription: I originally gave the game a 1 star review because it wasn't working and was freezing on my Quest 1. I almost lost all hope and came here to write a 1 star review to get their attension. They went back and fourth with me for over 40 emails trying all kinds of things and even created a special build of the game just for me to be a tester and send the Devs back the error reports. They fixed all the issues and now the game works great and is lots of fun! Thank you so much for all the assistance and the great game!

developerResponse.body: We do take customer service very seriously! Your case is very rare but we are glad that we can help. Please contact us any time if you have any problems.

website_page_meta.description:
Dash Dash is a cross-platform VR racing game with full hand driving and weapons controls.

Over 100 hours of gameplay contents including story mode, regular online tournaments, 100s of achievements and over 1,000,000,000,000 customizable parts.
website_page_meta.title: Dash Dash World · Oculus Quest
